name: Baby Whale
description:
Use sound to call out and listen for a reply which you can use to guide you home.

Unzip all files and run the .exe

Controls:
WASD or GamePad to move, 
QE or Right Stick to move up and down in the Water, 
Spacebar or Right Trigger to call out, 
Esc to close the game.

Credits: 

  • Colton - Audio
  • Katie - 3D Models
  • Strater - Unity Programing

This is a Global Game Jam Project I got to be a part of.  As the Audio Lead I created the Sound Design and the Musical Composition.

Enjoy!
